Description.description: The administrator app for Goal Tracking application for managing application configuration and reference tables such as Departments, Corporate Objectives and Fiscal Period, and view all Goals, Subgoals, Tasks.

CanvasApp.Name: mpa_goaltracking_25c62
CanvasApp.Description: The Goal Tracking app is designed to help admin users to set, monitor, and achieve their goals. It provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing goals, subgoals and tasks, tracking progress, and receiving approvals for every task completion.
